caption.title: Dengue epidemiological curves and weekly precipitation, Fortaleza, 2011â€“2015.
caption.p: Average precipitation by week is presented in blue. Line of weekly dengue case count citywide is presented in black. Scale is adjusted for dengue cases (left y-axis) between interepidemic (2013, 2014) and epidemic years (2011, 2012, 2015), and constant for precipitation (right y-axis).
